QuestData.Title: Cornered and Crushed!
QuestData.Description: <The Banshee Queen speaks through your mind.>$B$BWe must act quickly, $n. They mustn't be given the chance to flee. I am dispatching a squadron of my most powerful troopers to the Deep Elem Mine. I'm also sending the Horseman with them to ensure that nothing goes wrong. Meet him at the Deep Elem Mine, east of Olsen's Farthing, and CRUSH those rats.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Go to the Deep Elem Mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Master Forteski at the Deep Elem Mine in Silverpine Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: I s'pose we're to corner them first then crush, eh?
